timeline.message: fix exceptions message regex, tests, ui code clean up
moved DeviceController proto schema  check to DeviceProfileServiceImpl
changed schema for testPushMqttTelemetryWithTs: set Values as inner object

Merge pull request #3572 from ShvaykaD/feature/device-profile-telemetry-proto-schema

[3.2] Custom proto schemas for MQTT telemetry & attributes upload.

timeline.bodyText: throw new RuntimeException("Failed to get Message Descriptor due to :" + e.getMessage()); to be consistent with the getDynamicSchema
timeline.author: ashvayka

timeline.bodyText:
Please add the TODO to improve this in the future releases. We need two types of improvements:

No need to convert to JSON and back. If we know the structure of the message we can dynamically create our PostTelemetryMsg without JSON
Need to support Protobuf for all other methods (and configure the schema somewhere)
timeline.author: ashvayka
